info.name: Paybook Sync Site Connections
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes

| Code |                       | Description |
| ---- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| 400  | Bad Request           |             |
| 401  | Unauthorized          |             |
| 402  | Payment Required      |             |
| 403  | Forbidden             |             |
| 404  | Not Found             |             |
| 429  | Too Many Requests     |             |
| 500  | Internal Server Error |             |
| 503  | Service Unavailable   |             |

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

item.description:
Catalogues are collections of endpoints that are relevant to the data segmentation on some of the other endpoints.

#### List of Catalogues: 

1. Account Types
2. Attachment Types
3. Countries
4. Currencies
5. Sites Organization Types
6. Sites Organizations
7. Sites



#### Account Type

```json
{
    "id_account_type": "520d3aa93b8e778e0d000002",
    // SyncID; The ID of the Acount Type assignated by Paybook Sync
    "name": "Credit Card"
    // String; The name of the Account Type
}
```

#### Attachment Type
```json
{
    "id_attachment_type": "56bcdfca784806d1378b4567",
    // SyncID; The ID of the Attachment Type assignated by Paybook Sync
    "name": "CFDI (XML)"
    // String; The name of the Account Type
}
```

#### Country 
```json
{
	"id_country": "51ad44b83b8e7763120003c4",
	"name": "Mexico",
	"code": "MX"
}
```

#### Currency 
```json
{
	"id_currency": "523a25953b8e77910e8b4567",
	"name": "US Dollar",
	"code": "USD"
}
```

#### Sites Organization Types
```json
{
    "id_site_organization_type": "56cf4f5b784806cf028b4568",
    "name": "Bank",
    "label": "webapp_add_banks"
}
```

#### Site
```json
{
    "id_site": "572930c4784806060f8b456b",
    "id_site_organization": "572930c4784806060f8b456a",
    "id_site_organization_type": "56cf4f5b784806cf028b4568",
    "id_site_type": "5b285177056f2911c13dbce1",
    "is_business": 0,
    "is_personal": 1,
    "version": 1,
    "name": "American Express",
    "credentials": [
        {
            "name": "username",
            "type": "text",
            "label": "Usuario",
            "required": true,
            "username": true,
            "token": false,
            "validation": null
        },
        {
            "name": "password",
            "type": "password",
            "label": "Contraseña",
            "required": true,
            "username": false,
            "token": false,
            "validation": null
        }
    ],
    "endpoint": "/v1/credentials"
}
```

item.name: Sessions
Credentials

query.description: Credentials Object (this must be created using the credentials field of the Site ID provided).

item.description:
Credentials are the third-party data that is needed in order to authenticate with a third-party site. Credentials are encrypted upon arrival and won’t be available on any endpoint. Data pull from this endpoint is only complementary.

```json
{
    "id_credential": "5e7147e1e1ebe415cd6d7085",
    "id_user": "5da7886d3cfb1f31df68bef5",
    "id_environment": "574894bf7848066d138b4570",
    "id_external": "",
    "id_site": "5da784f1f9de2a06483abec1",
    "id_site_organization": "56cf4ff5784806152c8b4567",
    "id_site_organization_type": "56cf4f5b784806cf028b4569",
    "id_organization": "56cf4ff5784806152c8b4567",
    "is_authorized": 1,
    "is_locked": 0,
    "is_twofa": 0,
    "can_sync": 0,
    "ready_in": 86288,
    "username": "A**********C",
    "code": 200,
    "keywords": [
        "002",
        "003",
        "3.3",
        "emitidas",
        "i",
        "impuestos",
        "recibidas",
        "timbrefiscaldigital",
        "traslados",
        "vigente"
    ],
    "dt_authorized": 1584482308,
    "dt_execute": 1584482273,
    "dt_ready": 1584568708,
    "dt_refresh": 1584482308
}
```

item.name: Accounts
List accounts for a specific user

query.description: (optional) Is disable, some sites can have the option to retreieve transactions that are not longer valid, active, etc.
(optional)Limit the number of rows to be returned
(optional) Order the rows to be returned
(optional) Filters by keywords (for multiple keywords concatenate a string using a comma as a separator)
(optional) Filters by keywords (for multiple keywords concatenate a string using a comma as a separator)

item.description:
Accounts are repositories for end-user transactions which are often segmented by some distinction, such as account type and/or account number. Account and transactional data can be retrieved from third-party sites (refreshed) up to three times a day.

```json
{
    "id_account": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f567f",
    "id_account_type": "546d4904df527d1844a2e18d",
    "id_currency": "523a25953b8e77910e8b456c",
    "id_user": "5da7886d3cfb1f31df68bef5",
    "id_external": "",
    "id_credential": "5e7147e1e1ebe415cd6d7085",
    "id_site": "5da784f1f9de2a06483abec1",
    "id_site_organization": "56cf4ff5784806152c8b4567",
    "id_site_organization_type": "56cf4f5b784806cf028b4569",
    "is_disable": 0,
    "name": "Facturas CFDI ACM010101ABC",
    "number": null,
    "balance": 0,
    "currency": "MXN",
    "account_type": "IRS",
    "site": {
        "id_site": "5da784f1f9de2a06483abec1",
        "id_site_organization": "56cf4ff5784806152c8b4567",
        "id_site_organization_type": "56cf4f5b784806cf028b4569",
        "name": "SAT",
        "organization": "Acme Bank",
        "avatar": "/assets/Z1JLMk5FTTFTcVE4ZW81NWVEZU9sbFI3bEhOT0JEd2wyd2VsbjcrTWZYRzAxbzZEeUJqNGJuYnp6NUhjNG9nc1A4MlJXTENxVUlEdElaMVoreTlyNjlTSDFXaXBuckpqUGpFUytmcHU4dnhIQkt0QW81RHBKdz09",
        "cover": "/assets/Z1JLMk5FTTFTcVE4ZW81NWVEZU9sbFI3bEhOT0JEd2wyd2VsbjcrTWZYRzAxbzZEeUJqNGJxYXZVeEhjWWcxNTR0a25OMy9TV3dTMnE0VENlTmFzemVEYnZ2elhqWTVXa2JXU0lrclFtT3VteG8xN2sxeHN6QT09",
        "small_cover": "/assets/Z1JLMk5FTTFTcVE4ZW81NWVEZU9sbFI3bEhOT0JEd2wyd2VsbjcrTWZYRzAxbzZEeUJqNGJxYXZVeEhjWWcxNTR0a25OMy9TV3dTMnE0VENlTmFzemVEYnZ2elhqWTVXUTNZclN2TWF4YUJZNU9ib2crMWJpUUNyQ0NYRXVQWURpNmduU1JHTlRJZz0",
```

item.name: Transactions
Returns the number of transactions given some search parameters

query.description: (optional) Filters by site organization type ID
(optional) Filters by transactions with valid attachments
(optional) Filters by transaction refresh date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by transaction refresh date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by transaction date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by transaction date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by keywords (for multiple keywords concatenate a string using a comma as a separator)
(optional) Filters by keywords (for multiple keywords concatenate a string using a comma as a separator)
(optional) Filters by site organization type ID
(optional) Filters by transactions with valid attachments
(optional) Filters by transaction refresh date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by transaction refresh date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by transaction date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Filters by transaction date, expected UNIX timestamp
(optional) Limit the number of rows to be returned
(optional) Order the rows to be returned
(optional) Filters by keywords (for multiple keywords concatenate a string using a comma as a separator)
(optional) Filters by keywords (for multiple keywords concatenate a string using a comma as a separator)

item.description:
Transactions are financial movements that are related to an account. They reflect an income or expense that the end-user has on a specific site. The amount of historical data Sync retrieves will vary by source, but most often 60 days of transactions will be available.

```json
{
    "id_transaction": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f5680",
    "id_account": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f567f",
    "id_account_type": "546d4904df527d1844a2e18d",
    "id_credential": "5e7147e1e1ebe415cd6d7085",
    "id_currency": "523a25953b8e77910e8b456c",
    "id_disable_type": null,
    "id_external": "",
    "id_site": "5da784f1f9de2a06483abec1",
    "id_site_organization": "56cf4ff5784806152c8b4567",
    "id_site_organization_type": "56cf4f5b784806cf028b4569",
    "id_user": "5da7886d3cfb1f31df68bef5",
    "is_account_disable": 0,
    "is_deleted": 0,
    "is_disable": 0,
    "is_pending": 0,
    "description": "HERRERIA & ELECTRICOS SA DE CV",
    "amount": 49734.57,
    "currency": "MXN",
    "attachments": [
    {
        "id_attachment": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f5684",
        "id_attachment_type": "56bcdfca784806d1378b4567",
        "is_valid": 1,
        "file": "1CBB3C15-AC9D-4A31-875B-2BD048E61EA6.xml",
        "mime": null,
        "url": "/attachments/5e714804ba81405d9e6f5684"
    }
    ],
    "extra": {
    	"tax_id": "H&E951128469"
    },
    "reference": "1CBB3C15-AC9D-4A31-875B-2BD048E61EA6",
    "keywords": [
	    "002",
	    "003",
	    "3.3",
	    "emitidas",
	    "i",
	    "impuestos",
	    "timbrefiscaldigital",
	    "traslados",
	    "vigente"
    ],
    "dt_transaction": 1584511200,
    "dt_refresh": 1584482308,
    "dt_disable": null,
    "dt_deleted": null
}
```

item.name: Returns the extracted data from attachment

item.description:
Attachments are files that have a relation to accounts or transactions. The type of attachment will vary in its availability from its source.

```json
{
    "id_attachment": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f5684",
    "id_account": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f567f",
    "id_user": "5da7886d3cfb1f31df68bef5",
    "id_external": "",
    "id_attachment_type": "56bcdfca784806d1378b4567",
    "id_transaction": "5e714804ba81405d9e6f5680",
    "is_valid": 1,
    "file": "1CBB3C15-AC9D-4A31-875B-2BD048E61EA6.xml",
    "mime": null,
    "url": "/attachments/5e714804ba81405d9e6f5684",
    "keywords": [
        "002",
        "003",
        "3.3",
        "emitidas",
        "i",
        "impuestos",
        "timbrefiscaldigital",
        "traslados",
        "vigente"
    ],
    "dt_refresh": 1584482308
}
```
